name: Agni's Emissary
description: Rebecca fires 3 fire butterflies to up to 3 nearby enemies, dealing multi-hit Elemental DMG to a single target. Greatly lowers resistance on hit.

name: Animal Expert
description: Randomly summons a wolf, bear, or leopard for 18s. They perform melee attacks.

name: Arrow Storm
description: Summons a rain of arrows lasting 2.3s, dealing 20% SP.ATK DMG every 0.2s to hostile targets within a [7*7] meter area.

name: Beaver Combo
description: Performs a 6-hit combo, each hit dealing P.ATK DMG and knocking back the target.

name: BBQ
description: Spews fire toward the target, dealing SP.ATK DMG every 0.5s along the path. Can be used up to 5 times in a row.

name: Black Cat's Gaze
description: Every 0.5s, drains divinity energy from the target and restores the same amount to you, lasting 10s.

name: Blackhole Jet
description: Creates a black hole at the enemy's location for 11s, continuously pulling in hostile units within 17m and dealing 208.30% SP.ATK DMG every 1.2s. Consumes 500 Psi Energy.

name: Blade Declaration
description: Throws a dart at a random unit, dealing P.ATK DMG and marking the target for 15s. Mark: When the marked target's HP drops below 50%, Lethal Rabbit deals more damage to them.

name: Blink
description: Instantly teleports behind the target, increasing the next P.ATK DMG dealt.

name: Blink Strike
description: Randomly selects a target, teleports to strike them 5 times, each hit dealing P.ATK DMG.

name: Burn Aura
description: Activates a Burn Aura with a 6m radius, dealing SP.ATK DMG per second to enemies for 5s.

name: Chain Lightning
description: Releases lightning, dealing SP. ATK DMG to hostile targets within an 8-meter radius.

name: Charging Aura
description: Creates a 6m radius aura that restores Psi Energy to allies over 5s.

name: Chrysalis
description: Hardens the caster, increasing P.DEF and SP.DEF for 8s.

name: Corrosion Aura
description: Activates a 6m radius aura, dealing Physical DMG per second to enemies within range for 10s, while slowing their Movement Speed and increasing skill cooldown.

name: Crude Oil Spill
description: Tar Pudding enters an Oil Leak state for 15s, increasing SP.ATK and leaving 2m-radius oil puddles every 3s that last 20s.

name: Cryo Bullet
description: Fires an ice spike, dealing SP.ATK DMG.

name: Cyclone
description: Generates a mini tornado that moves toward enemies, dealing P.ATK DMG every 0.5s for 10s.

name: Damage Link
description: Links to an enemy target for 12s. During this time, damage taken is transferred to the enemy.

name: Deviant Energy Conduit
description: Selects an allied Deviation to restore Psi Energy every 0.6s for 3s.

name: Dodge
description: Grants immunity to the next incoming damage instances.

name: Electric Bullet
description: Fires an electric orb, dealing SP.ATK DMG, with a chance to inflict Power Surge. Power Surge: Increases Shock DMG, stacking up to a certain number of times.

name: Electrical Blast
description: Randomly throws electric orbs, dealing SP.ATK DMG, and applies 1 stack of Power Surge. Power Surge: Increases Shock DMG taken by, stacking up to a few times.

name: Elemental Overload
description: Increases SP.ATK for 8s.

name: Emergency Shield
description: Select an allied unit and grant them a shield based on their Max HP for 8s.

name: Explosive
description: Self-destructs after staying near the target for 5s, dealing AoE SP.ATK DMG. Has a chance to trigger when HP drops below 50%.

name: Fate Coin
description: Flip a coin and launch Mr. Wish Missile. Heads: deals 30% HP damage to enemies. Tails: deals 15% HP damage to yourself.

name: Flame Bullet
description: Launches a fireball, dealing SP.ATK DMG.

name: Flame Impact
description: Fires a fan-shaped flame, dealing SP.ATK DMG and inflicting Burn for 6s. Burn deals SP.ATK DMG per second.

name: Flame Jet
description: Sprays flames forward, dealing SP.ATK DMG to enemies in the path every 0.5s.

name: Flaming Flight
description: Leaves a burning trail, dealing SP.ATK DMG every 1.5s. Inflicts Burn on hit targets for 10s, dealing SP.ATK DMG per second.

name: Frost Satellite
description: Summons five ice crystal turrets that fire after 3s, dealing SP.ATK DMG.

name: Frost Vortex
description: Creates a Frost Vortex at the target location, lasting for 5s, dealing SP.ATK DMG per hit to enemies within range.

name: Group Elemental Overload
description: Increases nearby allies' SP.ATK DMG for 8s.

name: Group Physical Enhancement
description: Increases Physical DMG for all allied units.

name: Healing
description: Heals the ally with the lowest HP percentage, restoring HP based on the caster's Attack every 0.5s for 5s.

name: Healing Aura
description: Activates a healing aura with a 6m radius, restoring a percentage of Max HP per second.

name: Healing Bullet
description: Fires healing energy, healing allies for a percentage of the caster's Attack.

name: Healing Link
description: Selects allies within 12m to link and heal through shared damage.

name: Heavy Pressure
description: Leaps onto the target's head and slams down, dealing AoE P.ATK DMG and knocking the target back.

name: Ice Crystal Ambush
description: Creates an ice crystal under the target, dealing SP.ATK DMG. After a brief delay, the crystal explodes, dealing SP.ATK DMG and knocking back enemies in range.

name: Ice Crystal Barrage
description: Summons 6 ice crystals in succession, which launch after a brief delay, each dealing SP.ATK DMG in a 4m radius.

name: Incendiary Bullet
description: Fires a large fireball that explodes on impact, dealing SP.ATK DMG in an area.

name: Intimidation
description: Intimidates the enemy target, reducing their Physical Defense.

name: Kitty Punch
description: Delivers three consecutive punches: the first two deal P.ATK DMG each, followed by a third punch that deals P.ATK DMG and knocks back the target, while reducing the target's Attack for 5s.

name: Lightning
description: Calls down lightning at the target location, dealing SP.ATK DMG to enemies in range and applying Power Surge on hit. Power Surge: Increases incoming Shock DMG, stacking multiple times.

name: Lightning Pierce
description: Charges forward ignoring collision, dealing SP.ATK DMG to targets in the path.

name: Lucky Light
description: Summons two searchlights. Increases Multi-cast limit to 5, with a fixed 40% success rate, lasting 30s.

name: Mesh Traction
description: Entangles a target unit for 2.5s, pulling it toward you and dealing P.ATK DMG.

name: Meteor
description: Summons a meteor at the target location, dealing SP.ATK DMG. Creates a burning zone that deals SP.ATK DMG every 0.5s.

name: Outer God's Tentacle
description: Summons 1 tentacle to attack enemies nearby for a few seconds.

name: Penetrating Charge
description: Charges forward ignoring collision, dealing P.ATK DMG to targets in the path.

name: Physical Enhancement
description: Increases P.ATK for 8s.

name: Physical Shockwave
description: Releases a 90 degree cone-shaped shockwave forward, dealing Physical DMG to enemies up to 15 meters away.

name: Provoke
description: Taunts enemies within 12m, increasing the caster's P.DEF and SP.DEF for xs.

name: Psi Bullet
description: Fires an energy orb, dealing P.ATK DMG.

name: Psi Ray
description: Emits a beam toward the target, dealing P.ATK DMG to enemies in the path every 0.5s.

name: Pulse Orb
description: Launches a slow-moving electric orb, dealing SP.ATK DMG to all units in its path.

name: Pulse Ray
description: Shoots an elemental beam at the target, dealing SP.ATK DMG to enemies in its path every 0.5s.

name: Rain Arrow
description: Fires three rain arrows, dealing SP.ATK DMG to all enemy units along the path.

name: Rainy Peril
description: Generates 8 rain arrows nearby to attack target, each consuming current HP to deal SP.ATK DMG.

name: Rapid Charge
description: Restores Psi Energy.

name: Rapid Fire
description: Fires 3 Bullets, dealing single-target damage. May repeat 3 or 1 times depending on success/failure.

name: Resist Death
description: Triggers when HP is low, recovering lost HP.

name: Resonant Skybound
description: Teleports next to the target, dealing P.ATK DMG and knocking them airborne.

name: Rite of Strength
description: Sacrifices 10% of current HP to increase P.ATK and SP.ATK DMG for 6s.

name: Rush
description: Charges at the target, dealing P.ATK DMG and knocking down the target.

name: Savage Strike
description: Performs a melee attack, dealing P.ATK DMG.

name: Self-Healing
description: Gain a healing effect, recovering HP over 5s.

name: Self-Recharge
description: Restores Psi Energy.

name: Shadow Strike
description: Dashes forward and performs a draw slash. A crit instantly refreshes this skill.

name: Shield
description: Gains a shield based on Max HP, lasting 8s.

name: Space Twister
description: Deals P.ATK DMG per second to enemies within a 6m radius for 5s.

name: Speed Up
description: After casting, all general skill cooldowns are reduced by seconds.

name: Super Flammable
description: Self-destructs after staying near the target for 5s, dealing AoE SP.ATK DMG. Has a chance to trigger when HP drops below 30%.

name: Sweep
description: Performs a melee attack in an area, dealing P.ATK DMG.

name: Torpedo
description: Fires a randomly moving fish that deals SP.ATK DMG based on the caster's Attack and applies Power Surge to enemies on collision.

name: Upper World Protection
description: Grants shields equal to max HP to 3 allied Deviations and reflects DMG takens for 10s.

name: Void Zone
description: Creates an 8-meter radius void field around the caster that drains enemies' HP.

name: Weakspot Sniper
description: Aims at the target to deal P.ATK DMG, with a chance to deal additional damage and stun the target for 1s.

name: Whale Invasion
description: Summons a ghostly giant whale that leaps out of the water and lands at the target location ahead, dealing SP.ATK DMG to enemies within a 10m radius.

name: Whirlwind Slash
description: Performs a melee attack in a wide area, dealing P.ATK DMG.

name: Wild Shot
description: Performs 6 consecutive ranged strafes, each dealing P.ATK DMG.
